actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that a married couple must share equally in ownership of all income and assets, from what ever source, in order to qualify for joint income tax rate by amending Internal Revenue Code of 1954, as amended, section 6013(a).

summary.text: Bonnie Plan - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require each spouse on a joint tax return to verify by oath or affirmation that such spouse has equal ownership, management, and control of the income, assets, and liabilities of the marriage partnership.

titles.title: A bill to provide that a married couple must share equally in ownership of all income and assets, from what ever source, in order to qualify for joint income tax rate by amending Internal Revenue Code of 1954, as amended, section 6013(a).
